alert.note: Alert for Alaska Peninsula (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 13 at 10:41AM AKST until December 13 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON FROM NELSON LAGOON AND SAND POINT EAST... * WHAT...Blowing snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. East-Southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...From Nelson Lagoon and Sand Point east. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Webcams as well as observations in the area are showing very low visibilities and light to moderate snow falling. This is expected to continue through late this afternoon before gradually improving.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
